name: The Last Candle (NynyoSand)
description:
A game made for the Mini Jam 91 : UFO.

Protect your ship and your last candle  from flying lanternfish.

This is my first Game Jam ! The Game is really simple but I tried to make a unique atmosphere.

This is the first time I upload Game Files so tell me if it doesn't work.

Enjoy !

Controls:

RightClick/A : Speed Up

LeftClick/Z: Change Direction
